author: jta
msg: DERBY-2237 (partial) Corrects the Copyright page in the Japanese translation
of the Getting Started guide to match the correction in the English set,
This only corrects the Copyright line and notice, which are in English.
I did not attempt to add the license page even though it is in English
because that would require adding the file to the ditamap and I don't know
how to set the navtitle in Japanese.

msg: LOGCXX-161: Moved Pool and Mutex to eliminate destruct order problem

author: tfischer
msg: In the JDBCTransformTask in the generator, only add the attribute "default" to the column description in the generated schema if its value is not empty.
Thanks to Brian Telintelo for the patch.
